price: Anaasε wͻnhunuu sε Yεn na Yɛpia nsuo no dekͻ asaase a ͻpε asi soͻ a enni mfudeε biara no so, na Yεde ma nnͻbaeε a wͻn nyεmmoa ne wͻn ara die no fifi? Enti wɔnhunu anaa?
arabic: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ أَنَّا نَسُوقُ ٱلۡمَآءَ إِلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ ٱلۡجُرُزِ فَنُخۡرِجُ بِهِۦ زَرۡعٗا تَأۡكُلُ مِنۡهُ أَنۡعَٰمُهُمۡ وَأَنفُسُهُمۡۚ أَفَلَا يُبۡصِرُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: awalam yaraw annā nasūqu al-māa ilā al-arḍi al-juruzi fanukh'riju bihi zarʿan takulu min'hu anʿāmuhum wa-anfusuhum afalā yub'ṣirūna
